description: Great graphics card for my gaming and doing productive work.

name: Digital Alliance N30
description: Pretty sturdy PC case with good airflow. It is a great case for my PC build.

name: Custom Guitar ESP Snapper TAE Model
description: I play guitar too! This is my main guitar that I use for recording and playing.

name: FL Studio 20
description: Since I also play guitar and doing cover songs, I use FL Studio for recording and mixing. Pretty much DAW for beginners and professionals.
title: Fl Studio 20

name: LG 24GL600F
description: Pretty good monitor for gaming purpose. It has a 75Hz refresh rate and 1ms response time.
title: Lg 24 Gl600f

name: Macbook Pro 2018
description: I am currently using this laptop for my daily work. It is a great laptop for development work.
title: Macbook Pro 2018

name: Mihoyo Deskmat Silver Wolf and Luocha

title: Mihoyo Deskmat Silver Wolf And Luocha

name: Moondrop Blessing 3
description: I am loving the sound quality of this IEM. It has a good sound and very neutral, great for monitoring, music production, and casual listening.
title: Moondrop Blessing 3

name: Moondrop Nekocake
description: For some reason I am liking this TWS IEM. It has a good sound quality and the bass is just right for me.
title: Moondrop Nekocake

name: Roland Go Mixer
description: At first I used this only for its portability purpose with my phone, but now I use it also for my PC setup. It is a great mixer for the price.
title: Roland Go Mixer

name: Ryzen 3900X
description: Great CPU for my development work and gaming. It is a beast in terms of performance.
title: Ryzen 3900X

name: Sony Playstation 4
description: I don't play it as much anymore, but I do play CTR sometimes. I also use it for watching youtube on my TV.
title: Sony Playstation 4

name: VS Code
description: A no-brainer primary code editor. I use it for everything from writing code to writing this website.
title: Vscode
